div.p: Michigan Virtual Charter Academy is dedicated to providing an enriching learning experience tailored to each student's needs. The school encourages a collaborative partnership between teachers, staff, families, and students. The engaging, highly interactive curriculum challenges students, while Michigan-certified teachers interact with students in live, online class sessions and provide guidance and extra help when needed. Field trips and other activities help students connect in a vibrant, supportive school community.
